items.title: Self-Help Books That Offer Quiet Contemplation
items.description: Grief meets nature writing, we learn how to tuck away from burnout, 100 writing prompts for journaling, and more.

items.title: The Best Mystery & True Crime Book Covers of 2025
items.description: Books on sex cults, Hong Kong widows, and middle grade crime-fighting misfits have some of the best covers of the year.

items.title: DC Just Canceled Two of Their Best Comics
items.description: Plus, a little on what readers might expect from the franchise going forward, and the antiquated system that led to these cancellations.

items.title: Short Historical Fiction Books To Read Before the End of the Year
items.description: Nobel Prize winning authors, medieval romps, and evil Victorian governesses await you in these short but compelling books.

items.title: Appalachian Poetry For People Who Donâ€™t Usually Read Poetry
items.description: This collection, by the first openly gay poet Laureate for Kentucky, is a balm for those who are homesick for a better time.
